title: Germany football Munich Jerome Boateng feels ready to captain Germany, Bayern Munich Munich
text:
Sports News | 15 October 2015 22:40 CET Germany football Munich Jerome Boateng feels ready to captain Germany, Bayern Munich Munich - www.ghanasoccernet.com Jerome Boateng 
Defender Jerome Boateng believes he has matured in such a way that he can captain world champions Germany and his club Bayern Munich in the future. 
“It would be a dream to captain both teams! I think I have reached the age and developed to take over responsibility,” Boateng told Sky TV in an interview made available ahead of broadcast later Thursday. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
